iwork.patchpanel
Class PatchPanel

java.lang.Object
  iwork.patchpanel.PatchPanel
public class PatchPanel
extends java.lang.Object

The PatchPanel class provides a client interface to the translation mapping service. Any event that is posted to the event heap is a translation candidate. If The translation candidate matches any of the translation criteria, the output list of events are posted to the event heap.

PatchPanel

public PatchPanel(iwork.eheap2.EventHeap eHeap)
Creates an PatchPanel client interface for the event heap specified

Parameters:
eHeap - EventHeap the client is connected to
Method Detail

setGlobalVariable

public void setGlobalVariable(java.lang.String progName,
                              java.lang.String varType,
                              java.lang.String varName,
                              java.lang.String varValue)
                       throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The setGlobalVariable function adds a patch panel variable, or if a variable of the same name already exists, changes the value of the pre-existing variable.

Parameters:
progName - the name of the program in which the variable exists (to prevent conflicts between similarly-named variables in different programs)
varType - the desired type
varName - the name of the variable to be added/changed (this should be unique within its program)
varValue - the desired value of the variable
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

removeGlobalVariable

public void removeGlobalVariable(java.lang.String progName,
                                 java.lang.String varName)
                          throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

setTimer

public void setTimer(java.lang.String progName,
                     java.lang.String timerName,
                     long delay)
              throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The setTimer function adds a patch panel timer, or if a timer of the same name already exists, sets the existing timer to a new delay.

Parameters:
progName - the name of the program in which the timer exists (to prevent conflicts between similarly-named timer in different programs)
timerName - the name of the timer to be added/changed (this should be unique within its program)
delay - the desired delay of the timer (in milliseconds)
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

cancelTimer

public void cancelTimer(java.lang.String progName,
                        java.lang.String timerName)
                 throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The cancelTimer function cancels an already-set patch panel timer.

Parameters:
progName - the name of the program in which the timer exists (to prevent conflicts between similarly-named timer in different programs)
timerName - the name of the timer to be cancelled (this should be unique within its program)
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

setMapping

public void setMapping(Mapping mapping)
                throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The setMapping function updates the translation map to specify a new translation.

Parameters:
mapping - the translation specification that contains desired mapping
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

getMapping

public Mapping getMapping(iwork.eheap2.Event e)
                   throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The getMapping method returns the current translation specification for a particular translationCriteria.

Parameters:
e - containing the translationCriteria whose mapping should be retrieved.
Returns:
Mapping corresponding to the translationCriteria
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

getTranslation

public iwork.eheap2.Tuple[] getTranslation(iwork.eheap2.Event e)
                                    throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The getTranslation method returns the concatenated output list from all matching translation criteria. This method does not evaluate any field equations specified so the equations can be examined. The resulting output list is returned.

Parameters:
e - contains the translationCriteria whose mapping should be retrieved. The resulting output event list is placed inside of the Mapping parameter.
Returns:
Event[] containing translation output list of events
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

testTranslation

public iwork.eheap2.Tuple[] testTranslation(iwork.eheap2.Event e)
                                     throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
Remote Procedure call interface to the testTranslation method of the Intermediary. The testTranslation method returns the concatenated output list from all matching translation criteria. This method evaluates any field equations specified so the results can be examined. The resulting output list is placed in the Mapping.eventList property of the input Mapping parameter.

Parameters:
e - an event for which you would like to test in the patch panel without the outputs being posted on the event heap.
Returns:
0 on success -1 on RPC timeout failure
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

getAllGlobalVariables

public java.util.ArrayList getAllGlobalVariables()
                                          throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The getAllGlobalVariables method returns a list of all current variables within the current translation map, formatted as an array list of GlobalVar objects.

Returns:
an ArrayList containing all of the current global variables
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

getMappingsSummary

public java.lang.String getMappingsSummary()
                                    throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
getMappingsSummary returns a string summarizing all of the mappings in the PatchPanel

Returns:
the string on success null on RPC timeout failure
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException

getAllMappings

public java.util.ArrayList getAllMappings()
                                   throws PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
The getAllMappings method returns a list of all current Mappings within the current translation map.

Returns:
ArrayList object to place the result of the getAllMappings method call
Throws:
PatchPanel.PatchPanelException
